title: Synergistic magnetoelectric enhancement in 0–3 particulate multiferroic composites: unveiling the exceptional interplay of Ba0.85Sm0.15TiO3 and Co0.85Sm0.15Fe2O4 phases for superior energy conversion
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15915-15928
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01360C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Showket Ahmad Bhat, Mohd Ikram
This study investigates the complex investigation of the 0–3 particulate multiferroic properties found in composite materials.
